welcome_message_body: Welcome to Acarigua, Venezuela! Get ready to immerse yourself in the city's vibrant culture, delicious cuisine, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Acarigua has to offer.

restaurants.name: Panaderia & Pasteleria La Estrella
restaurants.description: Panaderia & Pasteleria La Estrella is a deli located in Acarigua.

restaurants.name: Subway
restaurants.description: Subway is a sandwich spot located in Acarigua.

restaurants.description: ZH Café & Gourmet is a café located in Acarigua.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Acarigua Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Acarigua Airport is responsible for handling all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free wifi network for up to 2 hours per day.
